article_title: FDA paves way for biosimilar drug approval

article_metadata.keywords: Pharmaceuticals companies news, pharmaceutical industry news, drug and pharmaceutical news headlines, healthcare industry headlines, company news, companies news, industry news, business headlines, financial times, ft.com

og.description: The US pharmaceuticals watchdog has published a bullish assessment of a copycat biotech drug, paving the way for it to approve its first ever “biosimilar” — a novel category of medicine that looks set to cut America’s ballooning healthcare costs.
og.title: FDA paves way for biosimilar drug approval - FT.com
